nodes.text: In 3 ABY, the Rebel Alliance light freighter Trumpet's Call was captured by forces of the Galactic Empire. The rebel crew of the freighter either suffocated or burned to death during the engagement as the life support systems failed. An infiltration team, devised by officers aboard the Imperial II-class Star Destroyer Herald, then hijacked the damaged Trumpet's Call to an Alliance flotilla in the Elochar sector, pretending to be rebel survivors from the battle, and infiltrated the CR90 corvette Thunderstrike.
The capture of the Trumpet's Call was first mentioned in the 2015 canon novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
